alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:59PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sweetwater County through 330 PM MDT... At 257 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Superior, which is also 15 miles east of Rock Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Sweetwater County, including the following locations... Southwest Wyoming Regional Airport, Reliance, Point Of Rocks and Sweetwater County Fairgrounds. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 100 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
